items.sentence: Tom cut an interesting article out of the newspaper.
If Tom could speak French, I\'d hire him right away.
I told the police that Tom was with me at that time.
I tried really hard to get Tom to help Mary do that.
I used the lemons that Tom gave me to make lemonade.
Tom told me that I shouldn\'t go out at night alone.
Tom had never seen a moose until he moved to Alaska.
Tom had no intention on waiting until Mary got back.
Tom had to duck his head to get through the doorway.
Does your mother ever complain about washing dishes?
